original_text: But if the owner is with his animal when something bad happens to it, you do not have to pay anything. And if you already paid your neighbour some money to use his animal, that will be enough to pay him for the loss.
korean_text: 그 임자가 그것과 함께 있었으면 배상하지 아니할지니라 만일 세 낸 것이면 세로 족하니라

sentences.original_text: But if the owner is with his animal
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 주인이 자신의 동물과 함께 있다면

sentences.original_text: when something bad happens to it
you do not have to pay anything
And if you already paid your neighbour some money
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 당신이 이미 이웃에게 일부 돈을 지불했다면

sentences.original_text: that will be enough to pay him
